data.name: XShapeGroup
desc: is implemented by Shapes that contain other Shapes.

methods.name: enterGroup
desc: enters the group which enables the editing function for the parts of a grouped Shape.
Then the parts can be edited instead of the group as a whole.
This affects only the user interface. The behavior is not specified if this instance is not visible on any view. In this case it may or may not work.

methods.name: leaveGroup
desc: leaves the group, which disables the editing function for the parts of a grouped Shape.
Then only the group as a whole can be edited.
This affects only the user interface. The behavior is not specified if this instance is not visible on any view. In this case it may or may not work.
